intro_bio:
I’m passionate about uncovering insights through data and giving them meaning through visualization. I enjoy programming and facing new challenges. I love learning something new every day and building solutions that solve real-world problems.

I truly believe data doesn’t just tell stories, it drives decisions. Want to know how to turn your data into decisions? I’d love to connect.
about_text:
I’m a calm and curious person, always eager to learn something new. I'm passionate about data analysis and programming, but I also value keeping balance in other areas of my life.

I enjoy working out, playing sports, and being in touch with nature. I love spending time with family and friends, sharing moments, and appreciating the little things. I'm also a fan of the superhero universe—I grew up with it and still find it inspiring.

I consider myself responsible and committed to what I do. I’m always looking to grow, take on new challenges, and add value to every project I work on.
contactdescription: It will be a pleasure to connect with you.
